verses.name: Ezekiel 38:4
verses.text: And I will turn thee back, and put hooks into thy jaws, and I will bring thee forth, and all thine army, horses and horsemen, all of them clothed with all sorts of armour, even a great company with bucklers and shields, all of them handling swords:

verses.name: Ezekiel 38:5
verses.text: Persia, Ethiopia, and Libya with them; all of them with shield and helmet:

verses.name: Ezekiel 38:6
verses.text: Gomer, and all his bands; the house of Togarmah of the north quarters, and all his bands: and many people with thee.
